title: Convex mirror - orientation and f from d-o and d-i

content.description: An object is located in front of a convex mirror, as shown in the figure. The object is a distance <math alttext="d sub o" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>d</mi><mi>o</mi></msub></math> from the mirror, resulting in an image that is a distance <math alttext="d sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>d</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> from the mirror. What is the orientation of the image, and what is the magnitude of the focal length of the mirror? Note that <math alttext="d sub o" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>d</mi><mi>o</mi></msub></math> and <math alttext="d sub i" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>d</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></math> are both taken to be positive quantities.
